abstract: Fast money is building in Potash after BHP Billiton’s $39 billion hostile bid, but the sheer size of the potential deal could limit the sway arbitrageurs and hedge funds have on the outcome.
snippet: Fast money is building in Potash after BHP Billiton’s $39 billion hostile bid, but the sheer size of the potential deal could limit the sway arbitrageurs and hedge funds have on the outcome.
lead_paragraph: Fast money is building in Potash after BHP Billiton‘s $39 billion hostile bid, but the sheer size of the potential deal could limit the sway arbitrageurs and hedge funds have on the outcome, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Fast Money Pours Into Potash, but Influence Limited

abstract: The S.E.C. case against two Spaniards who bought call options on Potash right before BHP Billiton’s takeover offer has some curious aspects.
snippet: The S.E.C. case against two Spaniards who bought call options on Potash right before BHP Billiton’s takeover offer has some curious aspects.

headline.main: A Curious Case of Insider Trading
